markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs=""
>
[Djezet Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1411)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Djezet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1410)

</column>

---

Armor made of djezet alloy is easy to enchant. Transferring runes onto djezet armor from other armor waives the usual 1/10 cost to etch the rune. This benefit has no effect on the cost of the rune itself or on the cost to transfer a rune off djezet armor onto a non-djezet armor. High-grade djezet armor can be etched with an additional property rune (to a maximum of four instead of three for _+3 armor_).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Djezet Armor (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

**Price** 1,800 gp (+180 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include at least 225 gp of djezet + 22.5 gp per Bulk.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Djezet Armor (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 98</row>

**Price** 35,000 gp (+3,500 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include at least 17,500 gp of djezet + 1,750 gp per Bulk.
name: Djezet Armor (High-Grade)
